actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment

official_title: To direct the Secretary of the Army to reassess the allocation of Federal and non-Federal costs for construction of the Cerrillos Dam, Puerto Rico.
subjects: Federal aid to water resources development

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army to reassess the allocation of Federal and non-Federal costs for construction of the Cerrillos Dam carried out as part of the Portages and Bucana Rivers, Puerto Rico, flood control project.

titles.title: To direct the Secretary of the Army to reassess the allocation of Federal and non-Federal costs for construction of the Cerrillos Dam, Puerto Rico.
